title: 12 Best Memorial Day Furniture Sale Items AD Editors Have Tested in 2025
description: Plenty of AD-approved pieces are marked down this year
author: Rachel Fletcher, Audrey Lee
excerpt: Our roundup of the best Memorial Day furniture sales and decor deals on the internet for lighting, furniture, rugs and home decor—whether you’re looking to invest or just need a little something.
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.Get your credit cards ready—we’re officially counting down to the best Memorial Day furniture sales of 2025. Not sure where to start? Lucky for all of us, the brand’s offering 20% off sitewide during their early Memorial Day sale promo.Buffy Eucalyptus Sheet SetBuffy Cloud ComforterSerena & LilyThere is no better way to get summer started than by decorating your home to look like a dreamy Cape Cod cottage. html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

Get your credit cards ready—we’re officially counting down to the best Memorial Day furniture sales of 2025. The holiday falls on May 26 this year, but a lot of the best Memorial Day sales have already started—and will last through the beginning of June. Lucky you!

Memorial Day sale promotions are an excellent time to score deep discounts on investment pieces like a stylish new sectional, some new outdoor furniture, or something for your home office. Not sure where to start? We’ve searched high and low to bring you the best trending Memorial Day furniture sales to shop right now—featuring some of AD’s favorite retailers like Castlery, Wayfair, and more. Keep an eye on this page, as we’ll continue updating you with the best furniture deals to score before and during Memorial Day weekend.

Our Top Picks:

  • Best Velvet Sofa: Article Sven Velvet Loveseat, $1,199 $719
  • Best Rug: AllModern Racheal Light Green Rug, $165 $115
  • Best Sofa Set: Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with Ottoman, $4,646 $4,409
  • Best Outdoor Chair: Serena & Lily Pacifica Swivel Chair, $2,398 $1,998
  • Best Mattress: Casper Dream Max Hybrid, $3,195 $2,235

Article

We love Article for its minimalist, light, and airy Scandi-inspired nightstands, dining chairs, bed frames, sofas, and more. Exactly why it’s exciting to see the furniture retailer is hosting a Memorial Day sale now through May 26, and you can score hundreds off on new furniture for the summer—including the love seat version of the sofa commerce editor Audrey Lee called “the Goldilocks of couches.”

Article Sven Velvet Loveseat

Article Sigrid Storage Coffee Table

Wayfair

Wayfair is great for those “I need a piece of furniture, quick!” moments. It’s also great for holiday sales. Right now, the major retailer’s offering up to 60% off during their pre–Memorial Day sale on bedroom furniture (including this area rug and sleeper sofa that the AD team has personally tested). Be sure to take advantage of these major markdowns on investment pieces like a bed frame, dresser, area rug, and more.

AllModern Racheal Light Green Rug

Wade Logan Kodie Upholstered Sleeper Sofa

Castlery

If you’re looking to deck out your dining room, home office, living room, or any other space in your house with new pieces, you’ll definitely want to check out Castlery’s early access Memorial Day sale. Senior commerce editor Rachel Fletcher especially loved reclining on the Jonathan chaise sectional sofa, and you can get a Jonathan leather sofa that comes with an ottoman at a little over $200 off.

Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with Ottoman

Castlery Karo Tripod Floor Lamp

Buffy

We’ve reviewed (and loved) many products from Buffy—the Breeze sheet set, the linen sheet set, the Cloud pillow, Breeze comforter, linen quilt, and so much more. Lucky for all of us, the brand’s offering 20% off sitewide during their early Memorial Day sale promo.

Buffy Eucalyptus Sheet Set

Buffy Cloud Comforter

Serena & Lily

There is no better way to get summer started than by decorating your home to look like a dreamy Cape Cod cottage. Serena & Lily can help you a bit in that department with their ongoing Outdoor Event, offering up to 30% off furniture and decor for alfresco festivities.

Serena & Lily Pacifica Outdoor Pendant

Serena & Lily Pacifica Swivel Chair

Interior Define

Our contributor Rachel Kalichman called Interior Define’s Gaby sectional “an elegant and neutral piece that can fit any type of decor style.” Head to their site now for 20% off on orders $2,999 and below, and get 25% off orders $3,000 and over.

Interior Define Gaby Leather Chaise Sectional

Interior Define Glenn Floor Lamp

Cozy Earth

Bedding and loungewear: They are the finishing touch for any carefully curated room. Now’s your chance to try the bedding brand that both Oprah and commerce editor Audrey Lee gave their stamp of approval to. Save up to 25% during the brand’s early Memorial Day sale. We recommend stocking up on the cool-to-the-touch bamboo sheet sets.

Cozy Earth Coronado Lounge Chair

Cozy Earth Linen Bamboo Sheet Set

Saatva

If you’re already purchasing some new sheets, then you might as well snag a new mattress to put your sheets on. Luckily Saatva, one of our favorite mattresses, is hosting a limited-time sale ahead of Memorial Day. We’d recommend taking advantage of the pre–Memorial Day deals to get the brand’s Loom & Leaf memory foam mattress, which writer Bailey Berg called the “most breathable, comfortable mattress” she’s ever tried. And be sure to check out our roundup of the best Memorial Day mattress sales happening right now!

Saatva Loom & Leaf Mattress

Saatva Santorini Bed Frame

The Company Store

There are a lot of things you could stock up on during The Company Store’s summer sale, but we recommend looking into the indoor/outdoor pillow situation. Regardless, you can get 30% off sitewide across all categories—no code needed.

Sunbrella Indoor/Outdoor Toss Pillow

Jersey Knit Comforter Set

Zinus

Zinus, who makes some of our favorite bed frames, is offering up discounts ahead of Memorial Day too. We’d use this as an opportunity to snag the Original Green Tea mattress, which is currently 20% off.

Zinus Cooling Green Tea Gel Memory Foam Mattress

Zinus Luca Reversible Chaise Sectional Sofa

Casper

The Clever staff has tried (and loved) a lot of Casper mattresses. In fact, we dedicated a whole story just to some of our favorites. One was the Nova mattress, which contributor Nora Taylor found offered the ideal balance of plushness and support. Though Casper doesn’t sell the Nova anymore, you can get the very similar Dream Max Hybrid mattress for 30% off as part of the brand’s early Memorial Day deals.

Casper Dream Max Hybrid Mattress

Casper Haven Bed Frame

SSENSE

SSENSE doesn’t carry your average home essentials. The pieces from this retailer are far more luxe and unlike anything you’ll find anywhere else—like this mug that looks more like a modern art piece. For the holiday weekend, the site is offering up to 50% off sale items. This is a much-anticipated seasonal sale, so don’t sleep on it.

Maki Rugs Entirety Rug

Henry Holland Studio Check Loop Mug
